title: Banana Boat Song
lyrics:
[intro - tremolo]
(C)Day-o, (F)Day-ay-ay-(C)o ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day, me say (G7)day, me say (F)day, me say (C)day (Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
                      
[normal strum]
(C)Work all night on a drink a' rum ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Stack banana till the mornin' come ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Come, Mister tally man, (G7)tally me banana ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Come, Mister tally man, (G7)tally me banana ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
It's (C)six foot, seven foot, eight foot BUNCH! ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)                         
(C)Six foot, seven foot, eight foot BUNCH! ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day-o, (F)Day-ay-ay-(C)o ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day, me say (G7)day, me say (F)day, me say (C)day (Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
                         
A (C)beautiful bunch a' ripe banana ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Highly deadly black tarantula ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
                                      
It's (C)six foot, seven foot, eight foot BUNCH! ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)                         
(C)Six foot, seven foot, eight foot BUNCH! ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day-o, (F)Day-ay-ay-(C)o ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day, me say (G7)day, me say (F)day, me say (C)day (Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Come, Mister tally man, (G7)tally me banana ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Come, Mister tally man, (G7)tally me banana ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
[outro - tremolo]
(C)Day-o, (F)Day-ay-ay-(C)o ((C)Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
(C)Day, me say (G7)day, me say (F)day, me say (C)day (Daylight come and me (G7)wan' go (C)home)
[end]
